headline: Cloudflare One DLP integrates with Microsoft Information Protection labels
keywords: Security Week, Security, Microsoft, Cloudflare One, Cloudflare Zero Trust, Cloudflare Gateway
description: Today, we are excited to announce that Cloudflare One now offers Data Loss Prevention (DLP) detections for Microsoft Purview Information Protection labels. Simply integrate with your Microsoft account, retrieve your labels, and build rules to guide the movement of your labeled data
